import React from 'react'; import Skeleton from '@material-ui/lab/Skeleton'; import './style.css'; import {image_base_url} from '../../../shared/util'; const MovieCard = React.memo(({item})=>{ return( item ?
{item.vote_average}
{item.title} ({item.release_date.split('-')[0]})
:
Movie Name
Year
) }) export default MovieCard;
